text: @afneil My friend sent me these pictures a few hours ago of a BA flight her flight attendant friend was repatriated in from Goa to London. Full plane, 270 passengers, 3 Covid-19 cases on board, no doctors, flight attendants not in proper PPE. 1/5 https://t.co/rbe6WgRqxD
